verses.name: Job 23:2
verses.text: Even to day is my complaint bitter: my stroke is heavier than my groaning.

verses.name: Job 23:3
verses.text: Oh that I knew where I might find him! that I might come even to his seat!

verses.name: Job 23:4
verses.text: I would order my cause before him, and fill my mouth with arguments.

verses.name: Job 23:5
verses.text: I would know the words which he would answer me, and understand what he would say unto me.

verses.name: Job 23:6
verses.text: Will he plead against me with his great power? No; but he would put strength in me.
